text: Alfonso Portugal Díaz (21 January 1934 - 12 June 2016) was a Mexican footballer. He played as defender for Mexico in the 1958 FIFA World Cup. He was born in Mexico City. Portugal captained Club América to the 1965–66 Mexican Primera División title. He also played for Club Necaxa. In 1967 he appeared in one match for the Chicago Spurs of the NPSL. Portugal died on 12 June 2016 in Atlixco, Puebla, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== *FIFA profile * *Profile at MedioTiempo Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:People from Puebla (state)
title: Alfonso Portugal
